text: Hey there. There must be a little trick somewhere for that, but can’t find it! How can I preview Hubdb dynamic “child” pages before I publish them? I can easily preview the “listing” page, but as soon as I hit a link to a child page, I get a 404, and I don’t find a way to get to its preview directly. Thx!

There is a way to do this manually (I put up an issue to support this through the UI but hasn't been a priority). When you have the page editor open, open up your network tab in chrome developer tools. Search for a request to `preview.hs-sites` and open that in a new tab. Now that you have a preview page, you can add a the query param `hubdb_row_id=` to the request to preview that page with a specific row
thx <@U6GNQ7JBU>! I got the preview page url and added the query param, but when I refresh with the new url I still have the listing page, not the child one. I must miss something :thinking_face:
Can you send me the link you are using?
